nodes.bodyText: This is a significant change to the behavior of the delete data stream request when a specified data stream is not present, but without this change, lots of tests running with security enabled fail because security resolves wildcard patterns to individual names including indices and those incorrectly trigger this ResourceNotFoundException error.
I also don't see a way around this.
at least this hack is removed :)
